techmeme.title: Nintendo projects Switch 2 sales to reach 15M units for the fiscal year ending March 2026, below 16.8M est., and $2.2B annual operating profit, below est. (Takashi Mochizuki/Bloomberg)
OpenAI says Fidji Simo will lead its business and operations teams in her new role as CEO of Applications, overseeing sales, marketing, and finance (Mike Isaac/New York Times)
Source: Fidji Simo will oversee several OpenAI executives who previously reported to Altman, including COO Brad Lightcap, CFO Sarah Friar, and CPO Kevin Weil (Bloomberg)
How "AI slop farmer" Jesse Cunningham targets older women on Pinterest and Facebook with AI-generated copies of content from real bloggers and creators (Maggie Harrison/Futurism)
An IBM survey of 2,000 CEOs finds that only 25% of AI initiatives have delivered expected ROI over the last few years, and only 16% have scaled enterprise wide (Tobias Mann/The Register)
